title: 'The Challenge: USA’ Episode 4 | Surviving the Challenge
description:
Tyson Apostol and Amelia Wedemeyer are back to talk about Episode 4 of ‘The Challenge: USA.' They discuss the ‘Big Brother’ group turning on each other, how to prepare for trivia challenges, and what Tyson looks for in allies.

Hosts: Tyson Apostol and Amelia Wedemeyer
Associate Producer: Carlos Chiriboga
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
